IT HAS BEEN OUR AIM TO HAVE THE ARRANGEMENT OF THE WORK, THE PREPARATION OF THE INDEX, AND THE FORM OF THE BOOK SUCH AS TO MAKE THE EXCELLENT MATTER WHICH IT CONTAINS EASY OF ACCESS, AND QUICKLY AVAILABLE FOR STUDY OR REFERENCE. WE, THEREFORE, SEND IT FORTH WITH THE EXPECTATION AND THE EARNEST PRAYER THAT IT WILL PROVE A SOURCE OF PLEASURE AND RICH BLESSING TO THE PRESENT AND FUTURE WORKERS IN OUR SABBATH-SCHOOLS.
              EXECUTIVE BOARD INT. S.S. ASSOCIATION.
